short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download TikTok videos from the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TikTok Video Downloader – Simple and Fast Video Downloads
Description: Easily download TikTok videos directly from your browser in just one click! Whether you want to save your favorite videos for offline viewing or share them with friends, this extension makes it fast and simple to do so. Enjoy hassle-free downloads with no watermarks.

Key Features:
One-Click Download: Quickly download TikTok videos directly from the video player, no need for copy-pasting URLs.
No Watermark: Automatically removes the TikTok watermark from downloaded videos, giving you a clean video file.
High-Quality Downloads: Save videos in the highest available quality for the best viewing experience.
Easy to Use: Just hover over any TikTok video, click the download button, and you're done! It’s that simple.
Fast and Efficient: Optimized for speed so you can download videos quickly and easily.
How to Use:
Install the extension.
Visit TikTok and hover over any video.
Click the download button that appears on the video.
The video will be saved to your device without the watermark!
Note: This extension is not affiliated with TikTok and is intended for personal use only. Please respect copyright laws and only download videos with the consent of the content creator.
